question: With reference to wildlife protection, TRAFFIC is a joint programme of:
option1: Global Environment Facility (GEF) and World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF)
option2: World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) and World Conservation Union (IUCN)
option3: World Conservation Union (IUCN) and Greenpeace International
option4: Greenpeace International and Global Environment Facility (GEF)
answer: World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) and World Conservation Union (IUCN)
explanation:
Second option is the correct answer
TRAFFIC is a joint programme of World Wide Fund for Nature (WWF) and World Conservation Union (IUCN).
